{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WAG354G}}
[http://homedownloads.cisco.com/downloads/WAG354G-EU_UG,0.pdf Manual] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Linksys/WAG354G On the OpenWrt wiki] :Device has a VLYNQ slot :"3762-38147005" is silkscreened on the board. The default SSID is probably '''linksys'''. ==Images== File:WAG354G big.jpg|board top [[Has images::internal| ]]
